message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $120. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something closer to $140. I'm confident this product is worth the price, and I'm sure you'll be happy with it.
Hello Alice, I understand your position and I appreciate your confidence in the product. I would like to offer $130 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
